      • sendToPlayer

        @Deprecated
public static void sendToPlayer(ChatMessage message,
                                             Player p)
        Deprecated. 
        Sends the given message to the player provided - deprecated as this can be done with player.sendChatMessage(message)
        Parameters:
        message - The message to send
        p - The player to send the message to
